name: impetuous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
likely to do something suddenly, without considering the results of your actions: He's so impetuous - why can't he think things over before he rushes into them?
said or done suddenly, without considering the likely results: The governor may now be regretting her impetuous promise to reduce unemployment by half.
